mapper.select: select t.id, t.`title`, t.`status`, t.`created`, t.`edited`, t.`owner`, t.`matrix` from task t where t.`owner`=#{owner} order by t.`edited` desc
mapper.insert: insert into task (title, status, created, edited, owner, matrix, fly_id) values (#{title}, 1, now(), now(), #{owner}, 2, #{flyId})
mapper.update: update task set status=0, edited=now() where id=#{id}; update flies set status = -1 where id = (select fly_id from task where id=#{id});
update task set status=#{status}, edited=now() where id=#{id}; update flies set status=#{status}-1 where id = (select fly_id from task where id=#{id});
